flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, Shawna was short of 30 - 12 = <<30-12=18>>18 situps
On Tuesday, Shawna was short of 30 - 19 = <<30-19=15>>15 situps
On Wednesday, Shawna would have to do 30 + 18 + 15 = <<30+18+15=63>>63 situps
#### 63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
